name: American Mensa Academy
description:
Get ready to stretch your grey matter as you put yourself through more than 100 interesting and challenging puzzles designed to stretch and train your brain in key areas including logic, language, visual and more. (Game in English only.)

American Mensa Academy is the only brain training game backed by Mensa, the high IQ society, so for the first time in a brain training game you’ll be able to put all that practice into action by taking on real Mensa-style questions, like the ones you see in the Mensa IQ tests. What will your American Mensa Academy score be?

1-4 players
HDTV screen resolution: 720p
Network Features
